HEADLINE: Headline _en
securitPprecaution: As a security precaution, your session has expired due to inactivity for more than two hours. Please login again,
accRegSuccessfully: is successfully registered for an ezyCommerce account. Your Merchant ID is
awaitingApproval: Your account is now awaiting approval. This shouldn't take long so we will send you an email as soon as your approval is done. We might contact you if we have further questions relating to your interest.
onceYorAccApprvd: Once your account is approved, you can now sign into your ezyCommerce account with the user name and password you chose during signup.
verLinkExpired: Oops! The verification link has expired. Please initiate the
frmLoginPg: from the login page if you have not verified
gotoLoginPg: to go directly to the login page
enterEmailBelow: Enter your email address below and we'll help you reset your password
enterSecAns: Enter your security answer given during SignUp
resetInstrSent: Reset instruction has been sent to your email
itAppearsForgotPw: It appears you've forgotten your password.
createNewOne: To create a new one, just enter and confirm it.
pwRule: Password should be 8 - 20 characters long. At least one upper case alphabet, one number and one special character like '@', '_', '!'.
noNotiToDisp: Currently you don't have any notifications to display..
enterMerchOrdInfo: Enter the Merchant Order ID, customer address and packing slip information for the order. Search and add products and enter number of units for each product. Click Next to view available delivery options and estimated charges. Fields marked with asterisk (*) are mandatory.
clickToAddProd: Click on the suggested product to add them.
makesureIsexportable: Please make sure the product is exportable for international orders. You can edit the product to change the active & exportable status.
removeProdsHighlighted: Remove the products highlighted in red or resolve the issues in order to create order
packingListPrev: for options and Packing list preview
yourOrderNotSentMsg: Your Order will not be sent for fulfillment before this date. If the Process Order Date is today then it will be sent immediately after approval. The date cannot be more than one week in advance.
idUniqueAllOver: An identifier for your order assigned by you. The ID should be unique across all Orders.
dispOrdIdPrintingPackSlip: Displayable Order ID is only used for printing on the packing slip which is sent to your customer.
dispOrdDatePrintingPackSlip: Displayable Order Date is only used for printing on the packing slip which is sent to your customer.
selectDeliveryOption: Select a delivery option for your order. You can optionally add enhanced liability coverage up to declared value. Review the total estimated charges for the order. Click 'Save Order' to save and edit the order later. Click 'Save & Approve Order' to approve and send this order for fulfillment. Inventory is allocated only when an Order is approved.
name: Name
estBasedOnWghtDimension: This is only an estimate based on calculated weight and dimensions. Billing will be based on actuals and may vary.
prodWght+Dunnage: Product(s) weight + 10% dunnage for packaging weight
volumeTierDiscounts: Volume tier discounts, if any are not shown here
addEnhancedLiability: Add Enhanced Liability(EL) to your shipment for
elCoverageNotAvailable: EL coverage not available for this Delivery option
calculatedValFromProdCatalog: Calculated values are taken from the product catalog.
ordDeclaredValCalcInfo: Order Declared value is calculated as the sum of product declared value(s) entered in the customs declaration section below
notMoreThanDeclaredVal: Cannot be more than declared value. Max EL amount for
customsDeclarationMandatory: Customs declaration is mandatory for International Orders. Select the products that you want to declare, review the customs information and edit if required. At least one product must be declared for us to ship the order. We will print and enclose the Commercial invoice CN22 / CN23 / CP72 form using the information you enter here.
exportedOfRecord: You will be the Exporter of Record for International orders. We will not hold responsibility for packages held by customs due to improper / false declarations.
addAtleastOneProdToCreateOrd: Please add atleast one product to create order
addOnlyExportableProdd: Please add only the exportable products for your international orders
insufficientInvInfo: have insufficient inventory to fulfill this Order. Please replenish your inventory or remove the product(s) that have insufficient inventory. You can continue to save this order and approve it later
saveOrdAsDraft?: Do you want to save the order as Draft?
merchOrdIdRequired: Merchant Order ID is required to save as Draft. You can edit it later
editCustomerInfo: You can edit customer address, packing slip information, add and remove products in the order. Click Next to view available delivery options and estimated charges. Fields marked with asterisk (*) are mandatory.
selectDeliveryOption: Select a delivery option for your order. You can optionally add enhanced liability coverage for the declared value. Review the total estimated charges for the order. Click 'Back' to go back to the previous step. Click 'Save Order' to save and edit the order later. Click 'Save & Approve Order' to approve and send this order for fulfillment. Inventory is allocated only when an Order is approved.
customsDeclationMandatoryCn22: Customs declaration is mandatory for International Orders. Select the products that you want to declare, review the customs information and edit if required. At least one product must be declared for us to ship the order. We will print and enclose the Commercial invoice CN22 form using the information you enter here.
addOneProdToEditOrd: Please add atleast one product to edit order
ordCancelledCannotRestored: Once an order is cancelled it cannot be restored
retreivingDataPlsWait: We are retrieving your data. Please wait
downloadOrdersTemplateExcel: Download the Orders template and open in Excel or any other spreadsheet. Please read and follow the instructions provided in the 'Guide' sheet before filling the data. Once you have uploaded the file, you can monitor the status in Order file upload summary section below
downloadTemplate: Click the button to download the template
orderTemplatedCannotCompleted: Order templates containing more than 100 unique orders cannot be completed(requires multiple uploads)
unploadCompletedOrdsFileMsg: Upload your completed orders file. Successful uploads are updated directly to the system, This will create an EZY-Order ID for each of your orders. Unsuccessful uploads will generate a validation report containing detailed error messages
cannotUploadAnotherFile: You can't upload another file until your previous file completes processing
unsuccessUploadReportOption: Only unsuccessful uploads have a download report option
trackOrdActivity: Track your order activity from here. Click on the tracking number to view the detailed status of your shipment
getMoreDetailedTrackingMilestones: You might be able to get more detailed tracking milestones for your orders
standardExpedited: Domestic Standard, International Standard and International Expedited - Track the shipments through
domesticEconomy: Domestic Economy - Track the shipments through
ifThereAreNoEvents: If there are no events in
trackShipmentDirectly: track the shipment directly through the websites of the postal administration of the destination country. For countries with no online tracking updates, SingPost will check with the overseas postal administrations on the status if the addressee did not receive the item after a stipulated time
currntPastBillingStatments: You can access current and past billing statements here
changesShownHere: The charges shown here are updated as of
chargesWillBeUpdated: Charges will be updated when the next statement is generated on
viewTransactionsReport: Please view the Transaction Report under Reports section to view the latest charges
notReflectedInThisSummary: will not be reflected in this summary. To view the latest payments please view the payments / adjustments table below
monthlyStatementGeneratedOn: Monthly Statement will be generated on the 28th of every month
last12BillingCycles: You can download monthly statements for the last 12 billing cycles here. If you want to see statement by transaction, download it from the Reports section under Transactions
noPaymentsOrAdjustments: There are no payments or adjustments
upgradeEvery30Days: Here you can upgrade once every 30 days. Please call customer service to downgrade your plan
maxOrdersPerMonth: Max. no. of orders per month
basicsToGetStarted: All the basics you need to get started
additionalFeaturesToExpandSell: Additional features to expand your sell
enhancedFeatureAndFlexibility: For enhanced feature and flexibility in scale
ultimateAllInOne: Ultimate all in one package with ultimate scale and personalized support
supportF2FTraining: Email,Live chat,Telephone Support,Face to face Trainings
selectedPowerSeller: You have selected Power Seller Plan
changeEffectiveImmediately: The change will be effective immediately and the billing will be prorated accordinlgy
manageConnectionsToExtSalesChannels: You can manage connections to external sales channels - marketplaces and shopping carts here
noSalesChannelConnected: You don't have any sales channel connected
addSalesChannelByClicking: Start by adding sales channels by clicking on your desired marketplace. Once authorized we will automatically pull orders from all your stores and ship it to your customers based on your preferences
importedOrdersDirectlySentForFulfillment: Imported Orders will directly be sent for fulfillment after x number of days.  Orders that have discrepancies will override and be placed under Pending for further action
autoUpdateShipmentTracking: Automatically update Shipment status and tracking number
emailOrderImported: Email me once an order has been imported
emailNotiOrderPulled: An email notification to the registered email will be sent when an order is pulled from this store
runReportsOfAccActivity: You can run reports of your account activity here. You can download all data or use filters to limit results to specific ones
yearCompanyFounded: Year in which company was founded
numberOfOnlineChannelsCurrentlySellingIn: Number of online channels currently selling in
noOfOverseesCountriesSellingIn: No. of oversees countries currently selling in
closeDeleteAccPermanently: This action will close/delete your account permanently
allInvRemovedFromWarehouse: All inventory must be removed from the warehouse
emailPendingPayments: An email will be sent regarding pending payments
addOneProdToCreateShipment: Please add atleast one product to create shipment
canChangeAccPw: You can change account password, modify contacts details and manage your account status here
chooseModulesToView: Choose which modules can be viewed
allowViewSelectedModules: Allows the user to view selected modules
accessCreateModifyPerform: Access to create, modify and perform actions on products
accessCreateInboundPlans: Access to create inbound plans, cannot ship Orders
accessCreateModifyOrders: Access to create and modify orders, cannot approve for Order Fulfillment
accessApproveOrdersFulfillment: Access to approving orders for fulfillment
accessViewOutstandingAmount: Access to view the outstanding amount and download monthly bill
accessAddModifyChannels/Marketplace: Access to add and modify channels/marketplaces
configEmailPreferences: You can configure your email preferences here. This will apply to all users of this account
emailProdUploadCompleted: Email me when Product upload is completed
validationReportPresentAttachments: The validation report will be present in attachments if any
emailProdDimensionUpdated: Email me when a Product's dimension is updated by EZC
emailProdInventoryFulfillableFallsBelowI: Email me when Product Inventory Fulfillable falls below the corresponding Inventory Alert Level
emailShipmentUploadComplete: Email me when Shipment upload is completed
emailShipmentStatusChangesIntransit: Email me when a Shipment status changes to 'In Transit'
emailOrdUploadCompleted: Email me when Order upload is completed
emailOrdStatusPedingToHasissues: Email me when an Order status changes to Pending - Has Issues
emailOrdStatusPendingUnapproved: Email me when an Order status changes to Pending - Unaprroved
emailOrdStatusToInprocess: Email me when an Order status changes to 'In Process'
emailOrdStatusToShipped: Email me when an Order status changes to 'Shipped'
emailOrdStatusToDelivered: Email me when an Order status changes to 'Delivered'
emailDailySummayAllPendingItems: Email me a daily summary on all Pending items (Shipments and Orders)
emailMonthlyInvReady: Email me when monthly invoice is ready to view
interactivePricingCalcMsg: Use the interactive pricing calculator to get an estimate of Handling and Storage rates based on your volumes. These rates are only for your reference and does not reflect actual usage for your account
aveNoOfOutboundPerMonth: Average number of outbound orders per month
aveNoOfUnitsEachOrder: Average number of units in each Order
storageCycleCountInvMgt: Storage, Cycle count and Inv. Mgt
storageCapacityRequiredCbm: Storage capacity required in cubic metre (cbm)
offersMultipleDeliveryOptions: ezyCommerce offers multiple delivery options for Domestic and International orders
domesticEconomyRatesStart: Domestic Economy rates start from SGD 3.94 per order
domesticStandardRatesStart: Domestic Standard rates start from SGD 4.99 per order
internationalDeliveryHasEconomy: International delivery has Economy, Standard and Priority options to more than 220 countries. Rates vary by weight and destination and starts from SGD 7.95 per order
connectEbaySellerAcc: Connect to your eBay Seller Account
canSellEbayAndEzycommerce: With ezyCommerce, you can sell on eBay and use ezyCommerce as the fulfillment solution for your eBay orders. In order to do this, you need to add your eBay seller account on the ezyCommerce platform
syncFollowingInfoWithEbay: We can synchronize the following information with eBay
startPollingEbayServers: Once you are connected, we will start polling eBay servers periodically to check for new orders under your account. All new and modified orders will be downloaded into your ezyCommerce account
orderShippedInfoPushedToEbay: When an order is shipped, status and tracking information is pushed to eBay
followProcedureBelow: Follow the procedure below to add your eBay account to ezyCommerce
redirectedEbayWebsite: you’ll be directed to the eBay.com website. Simply enter your eBay credentials and it will link up. eBay has unified logins between all their individual websites for different countries
enterRequiredAccInfo: Enter the required account information – your username and password. EBay uses oAuth security authentication mechanism hence nobody including us will not have access to your account password
grantAccesForEzycommerce: to grant access for ezyCommerce to access your eBay account and you’ll be redirected back to the ezyCommerce Connections page
makeSureEbayListing: You need to make sure that your eBay listings have the same
importOrdFromEbay: so that when we import an order from eBay, we can identify the relevant products to ship. Other forms of product identification such as Product ID, ezy-SKU will not work. Only products with matching ‘Merchant SKU’ will be identified. If you are selling multiple variants of an item, click
knowProcessSetupVariantSkus: to know the process to setup variant SKUs in your eBay listing
updateShipmentTrackingInfo: If you would like to update shipment tracking information back to eBay, check
connectionsPageInfo: in the Connections page. Once your orders have shipped, we will automatically push tracking information into Ebay and change the order status to “Shipped”
supportOnlyDirectEbayConnection: At this time, we support only Direct eBay connection. We do not support eBay via Paypal IPN connection
shopifyStoreClickConnect: Enter you Shopify store domain and proceed to click ‘Connect’. You will be redirected to Shopify’s site to authorize ezyFulfillment by providing your login credentials
assignYourSubuserFromPredefinedRoles: Assign your sub-user from a set of pre-defined roles to manage your business. You can change the previleges of the sub-users after creation
chooseUserPermissionsForSubuser: Choose one or more user permissions for your sub-user
allowUserEditRespectiveModule: Allows the user to edit the respective module
allowUserCreate/EditPerformActions: Allows the user to create / edit and perform product related actions on products
allowUserCreate/EditShipmentAndOrders: Allows the user to create / edit Shipment and Orders. The user can perform fulfillment related actions on products
allowUserAdd/ModifySalesChannels: Allows the user to add / modify sales channels, preferences and download reports. Allows the user to add / edit all sections under My Account except User Accounts
sellingAllAbovePermissions: Selecting all the above permissions gives complete access to your account except User Accounts
existingCardInfo: Your existing card information is shown here. If you would like to edit it or add a new card, you need to delete the existing card info
showExistingCard: Show Existing Card - Temporary Link to Show static Page
authorizeValidateInfo: Once you enter the card information, we will authorize and validate the information
siteSslEncrypted: Our site is SSL encrypted and your card information is safe with us
configureShippingPreferences: You can configure your default shipping preferences here. You can turn on automatic order fulfillment to automatically approve external orders upon receipt
ordersAutoApproved: When activated, Orders will be automatically approved on your behalf by applying the preferences in Order defaults. Orders will be put on hold if it matches the below criteria
holdOrdersAboveRetailValue: Hold orders above retail value greater than SGD
existingOrdAppliedOrders: Existing order defaults will be applied to the orders
defaultAppliedNewOrder: Defaults will be applied to new order. You can still edit the order before approval
addEnhancedLiabilityCoverage: Add Enhanced Liability (EL) coverage on the total Declared Value for
downloadOrdersByDateRange: Here you can download all orders  by specifying a date range. Maximum date range allowed is 3 months from the current date. Please call client service and raise a request if you need older records
canDownload10PrevFiles: You can download up to 10 previously generated files
noDownloadHistory: You don't have any download history
canSetOtherPreferences: You can set other preferences such as customizing packing list message and setting default label sizes for Shipments
enterNamePrintOnPacking: Enter the name to be printed on the packing List at the header level
identifyBrandNameInMarket: This is typically your brand name and how the cutsomers identify you in the market
footerInfoPrintOnPacking: Enter the footer information to be printed on the packing list (if any)
msgToConveyCustomers: It can be any message that you want to convey to your customers
labelPreselectedOnCreateShipment: This will be the default label size that will be pre-selected when you create a Shipment. Contact Client Service if you want to order label supplies
downloadAllTransactionsByCustomDateRange: Here you can download all transactions by specifying a custom date range. Maximum date range allowed is 12 months from the current date. Please call client service and raise a request if you need older records
adjustmentsAndPayments: Adjustments and payments, if any are not shown in the transactions report
downloadAllProdsOrFilteredData: Here you can either download all products or download filtered data. Apply the filter and proceed to Download.By default Product Category is All and Active is selected. The report will be in CSV format which can be used for file uploads
downloadCompleteProdsCatalog: This will download the complete Products catalog ignoring the filters
downloadOneShipmentAtATime: You can download only one Shipment at a time.  Enter either the Shipment ID or Shipment Plan Name that you entered during the creation process
provideEntireShipmentId: You have to provide the entire Shipment ID or the Shipment Plan Name. Partial matches will not be accepted
addEditRemoveOtherUsers: You can add, edit and remove other users for your account here
noSubUserSetup: You don't have any sub-user set up for this account
createSubUserForSubordinates: Create a sub user account for your sub-ordinates to manage your business. You can control their permissions at all times
plsSetMercContext: Please set the merchant context in the merchant table to add payments or adjustments. Once you set the context data for that merchant will be reflected here
viewMercDetails: You can view merchant details here
noOfOnlinceChannelsSelling: Number of online channels currently selling
manuallyFillFileds: Manually fill up the fields to create a product. No two products must have the same Merchant SKU. Apply Customs declaration information to be used in future orders. Fields marked with asterisk ( * ) are mandatory
allFragileProdsMustPacked: All fragile products must be packed in such a way that they pass the standard 4-foot drop test
createProdWithoutProdIdConfirmationMsg: Are you sure you want to create the Product without a Product ID (EAN/UPC/JAN/ISBN)?
makesurePhysicalBarcodeAvailable: Please make sure that the Merchant SKU physical barcode is available on the product
identifierForProd: An identifier for the product, assigned by you.  The SKU must be unique across all your Products
longestSideOfProds: Longest side of the product should be given as length. Max. Length 105cm and L+2W+2H should not exceed 200cm
notifyFulfillableHitsAlertQuantity: We will notify you once the fulfillable quantity hits the alert quantity. Giving 0 will alert you once it is out of stock
onlyCertainInfoCanEdited: Only certain information can be edited. Product defaults cannot be edited after product creation. Fields marked with asterisk (*) are mandatory
trackProdActivityFromHere: Track your product activity from here
onlyProdsHaveInvHistoryShownHere: Only Products that have inventory history are shown. Products that were never sent to the warehouse even once will not be shown
downloadProdTemplate: Download the Products template and open in Excel or any other spreadsheet. Please read and follow the instructions provided in the 'Guide' sheet before filling the data. Once you have uploaded the file, you can monitor the status in Products file upload summary section below
toStartDownloadImportTemplate: To get started, please download the import template in one of the formats below. The file contains guidelines on how to fill the template. You can upload a maximum of 500 products at one go
dontWorryIfFileContainsError: Once you've added your products to the template, upload it here. Don't worry, if your file contains error, we will generate a status report to help you correct those errors
viewStatusOfFileHere: View the status of the file here. If your upload has some problems, you can download a status report which will help you to correct the errors. The same file can be upload again in Step 2
noAccessViewPage: Sorry, You don't have access to view the page you requested. Please use different credentials or contact Client Service
weRedesigned: We have redesigned our site and it looks like the page you want has gone on vacation
hereLittleMap: Here's a little map that might help you to get back on track
leavPageConf: Are you sure you want to leave this page?
archiveProdConf: Are you sure you want to Archive this Product?
createInactiveProdConf: Are you sure you want to create Inactive Product?
makeInactiveConf: Are you sure you want to make product as Inactive?
cancelShipmentConf: Are you sure you want to cancel this shipment?
restoreShipmentConf: Are you sure you want to restore this shipment?
cancelOrderConf: Are you sure you want to cancel this order?
restoreOrderConf: Are you sure you want to restore this order?
clientServiceTeamWillContactYou: Our client service team will review your account closure request and will contact you if there are outstanding issues regarding your account. All outstanding balances must be paid in full before account can be fully closed. A new account cannot be created with the same details as the closed account. Your data and reports may not be saved once your account has been closed. Please contact Client Service if you are unsure before proceeding to close your account
updateTrackingStatusConfMsg: Are you sure you don't want to update tracking status back to your sales channel? Your customer will not be aware of the order status & tracking number
removeSalesChannelConfMsg: Are you sure you want to remove this sales channel? You can no longer receive orders from this channel. If there are outstanding Orders in ezyCommerce from this channel, their status will not be updated
deleteUserConf: Are you sure you want to delete the user?
checkAtleastOneProd: Please check at least one product to perform any product action
signedinAccMsg: Now that you are signed in to your ezyCommerce account, we'd like to highlight some important points before you send in your inventory and place your orders. It's important you understand this clearly so you can plan ahead and we can always ensure a great experience for your customers
inboundShipmentsRcvdByWarehouseMsg: For all Inbound Shipments received by the warehouse on business day 0 by 4pm - goods will be received and ready for fulfilment
businessDay2Info: on business day 2 by 4pm. However, we strive to receive all shipments within 1 business day and update you as soon as shipment is closed
followShipmentPrepGuidelines: Please follow the shipment preparation guidelines to ensure a smooth and timely receiving process
outboundOrdsApprovedInfoMsg: For all Outbound orders approved on business day 0 by 9am, Orders will be shipped out of warehouse
businessDay1Info: on business day 1 by 5pm. However, we strive to ship out all orders received until 8 AM on business day 1 on the same day
dependingUponTheDeliveryMethodMsg: Depending upon the delivery method chosen by you, the delivery service level agreement will start from the time your order is shipped out of our warehouse. For example, when using Domestic Standard delivery, all orders shipped out by 5 PM on business day 0 will get delivered latest on business day 1, by 6 PM
slasGuidelines: section for detailed SLAs and other guidelines
readyToSellOnline: Now you're all set, get started and get ready to transform the way you sell online
leaveAsYourDetails: Leave us your details and we will get in touch with you as soon as possible
copyRights: @ 2014 SINGAPORE POST LIMITED. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED
enterInboundShipmentPlanMsg: Enter the Inbound Shipment Plan Name and Ship From address. Search and add products you wish to send to the warehouse. Choose who will label the units in the shipment. Click Create Shipment to create an Inbound Shipment ID. Fields marked with asterisk (*) are mandatory
removeProdHighlighted: Remove the products highlighted in red or resolve the issues in order to create shipment
cannotEditAllInfoMsg: You can edit all information other than Inbound Shipment Plan Name. Add or remove products and choose who will label the units in the shipment. Click Next to proceed to the next step and update Inbound Shipment details
addOneProdEditShipment: Please add atleast one product to edit shipment
updateInboundShipDetailsMsg: You can update the Inbound shipment details and print labels here. We advise you to update the Carrier name and Carrier Tracking Number if you have this information. We will start receiving the shipment only after the complete shipment has arrived. The total number of cartons we receive should match what you enter here. Please provide the carton number visible from the outside
prodWillReadyForOrdFulfillment: Products will be ready for order fulfillment by
ifSendShipBefore: if you send the Shipment before
makeSureFollowingTasksCompletedMsg: Please make sure that the following tasks have been completed before you send the Shipment. This will allow us to receive and process your Shipment without any delays.
shippingRightProds: You are shipping the right products (SKUs) as given in the Shipment.
unitsShippedEachProdMatches: Number of units shipped for each product matches with the Shipment quantity for each product.
prodLabelsPrintedPastedEveryUnit: Product Labels have been printed and pasted on every unit (if you chose 'Merchant' under Who labels?).
prodLabelsPrintedPastedEveryExtCarton: Shipment Box labels have been printed and pasted on every external carton in the shipment.
allItemsSecurelyPacked: All items are securely packed with suitable packaging/filler materials - without any open/damaged cartons.
allCartonsFullySealed: All cartons are fully sealed with brown tape or transparent tape.
cartonEnteredMatchesCartonsShip: Total number of cartons you enter in this page matches with the total number of cartons you ship to us.
inboundShipmentNotiRcvdWarehouse: For Inbound Shipment notices received by the warehouse before the cut-off time at business day 0 by 4pm -  goods will be received and ready for fulfilment latest by business day 2 by 4pm. However we strive to receive all shipments within 1 business day.This SLA does not apply if the Inbound shipment has problems such as damages and quantity discrepancies
downloadShipTemplateOpenExcel: Download the Shipment template and open in Excel or any other spreadsheet. Please read and follow the instructions provided in the 'Guide' sheet before filling the data. You can upload only one shipment at a time. Once you have uploaded the file, you can monitor the status in Shipment file upload summary section below.
updatedWarehouseReceivesShipment: Will be updated once warehouse receives your Shipment
trackShipActivity: Track your shipment activity from here.
weExcitedMsg: We’re really excited that you’re interested to sign up for ezyCommerce. Please have the following information ready before you begin
validEmailAccessTo: A valid email that you have access to
regCompanyNameAddr: Your registered company name and address
validContactNoAllowsReachYou: A valid contact number that will allow us to reach you during the registration process
thisWillYourUsernameMsg: This will be your username. Kindly make sure that you can access this email. We will send a verification link to this email after you SignUp
needToRegCompanyInSg: You need to be a registered company in Singapore and provide a valid UEN / GSTN
chooseSecurityQuestionMsg: Please choose a security question and an answer that is simple to remember yet difficult to be guessed by others
giveUsContactDetailsMsg: Give us your contact details below. Our Merchant Support Team might use the information you enter to contact you.
plsProvideMoreInfoMsg: Please provide us more information about your business to help us serve you better.  You may be eligible for the ezyCommerce-SPRING SME subsidy grant which will provide you rebates up to 70% of your monthly fulfillment charges
applyForThisGrant: To apply for this grant, you should be
regCompanyInSgInfo: Registered company in Singapore and have at least 30% local shareholding
companyGroupAnnualSalesInfoMsg: Company group annual sales not more than $100mil (OR) company group employment size not more than 200 workers
appReviewedDaysInfo: Your application will be reviewed within 3 working days and you will be informed on the outcome. SP eCommerce reserves the right to revise applicable eligibility terms, accept or refuse the grant without providing any reason
notMeetEligibilityCriteriaMsg: If you do not meet the eligibility criteria, you can still go ahead and sign-up for ezyCommerce without the grant
wishToApplySmeInfo: I wish to apply for the ezyCommerce-SME subsidy grant and confirm that I meet the above criteria for the application
plsProvideBelowInfo: Please provide the below information for our reference
tellMoreAboutYourBusinessMsg: Tell us a little more about your business. This will help us to serve you better and customize special offers or packages exclusively for you
urlCurrentlySelling: URL of Website where you are currently selling
numberOfOverseasCountriesSelling: Number of overseas countries currently selling
existingSingpostCorporateCustomer: Are you an existing Singpost Corporate customer?
allEnteredInfoShownHereMsg: All the information you entered in Steps 1 and 2 are shown here. Please make sure they are correct and agree to the standard T&Cs before you register. Click on the Back button to modify any information. If you are all set, click Sign Up Now to complete your registration.
appliedSmeNotifiedOfApp: If you have applied for an ezyCommerce-SPRING SME subsidy grant, you will be separately notified on the outcome of this application.
noOfOverseasCountriesSelling: No. of overseas countries currently selling
readAgree: I have read & agreed to the
readyToGetStarted: you're almost ready to get started!
tankForSignupMsg: Thank you for signing up for an ezyCommerce account. An activation email has been sent to
plsClickActivationToVerifyMsg: Please click on the activation link to verify your email. You can login to your account as soon as your account has been approved by the administrator
dintReceiveEmailMsg: Didn't receive an email?  Please check your junk folder and add ezyCommerce domain to your safe senders list. If you still didn't receive the email, you can submit a request to
gotQuestionsContactInfo: Got questions? Contact us at +65 6229 5979 or email us at support@ezycommerce.com
warnPageNavigation: Are you sure you want to leave this page?
uploadSuccess: File has been uploaded successfully. You will be notified when processing has been completed
uploadInvalidFiles: File format is invalid. You can upload files with the extensions .xls, .xlsx and .csv only
uploadStopAnotherFile: You cannot upload another file until your previously uploaded file processing has been completed
addProducts: At least one Product should be added to continue
addExpoProducts: One or more products that you have added is not Exportable. For International Orders, add only Exportable products.
addProductError: Oops..an error occurred when adding the product. Please try again.
labelInvalid: Please select a valid label type from the available templates
labelDownloadError: Oops..an error occurred when downloading the label. Please try again.
invalidnumber: This field should be a positive number
invalidweight: Weight should be a positive number less than 30 Kg
invalidhscode: HS Code should be at least 6 characters
countryFetchError: Oops..an error occurred when downloading the country list. Please refresh the page to try again
currencyFetchError: Oops..an error occurred when downloading the country list. Please refresh the page to try again
fileProcessingCompleted: File upload has been processed. Click here to view the status.
warnSessionExpire: Your session will expire in a few seconds due to inactivity. Click continue to keep the session active.
invalidCredential: The Username or Password your entered is incorrect.

noCarrierAvailable: Sorry. We could not find any suitable delivery option for your order. This can be due to weight limitations, destination Country or the combination of Products in your Order. If you think this is an error, please contact client Service.
headerProductActive: Active Products can be used to create Shipments and Orders. Active Products cannot be made inactive if there is existing inventory in the warehouse, impending Shipment or open orders.
headerProductInActive: Inactive products are not allowed for creating Shipments and Orders. Products can be made inactive because they are not sold anymore or temporarily discontinued or seasonal products etc. You can change a Product to active status at any time.
headerProductAll: Create and manage your product catalog here. Add products one at a time by typing the product information or in bulk by uploading a file using our standard template. Once Products are created and activated, you can use them to create shipments, orders and do more
noProductsHeaderTextActive: You don't have any Active products in your catalog.
noProductsHeaderSubTextActive: Start by adding products by filling out the product information manually or bulk upload products using a spreadsheet.
noProductsHeaderTextInactive: You don't have any Inactive products in your catalog.
noProductsHeaderSubTextInactive: You can move your discontinued or seasonal products to inactive status.
noProductsHeaderTextAll: You don't have any products in your catalog.
noProductsHeaderSubTextAll: Start by adding products by filling out the product information manually or bulk upload products using a spreadsheet.
headerShipPending: Inbound Shipment consists of a list of active products and corresponding inventory (number of units) that you want to send to the warehouse. Your pending shipments are shown here. Click the Edit icon to modify the shipment details. Once you have prepared and labeled the shipment, you can update the shipment status to In Transit.
headerShipInTransit: We are expecting to receive your shipment on the estimated arrival date. You can still print and paste labels if you have not sent your shipment. We will receive the inventory once the complete shipment has arrived and update the shipment status.
headerShipReceived: We have received your shipment. You can view the shipment receipt which shows the number of units received against each product in the shipment. If we received any unidentified products in your shipment, our client service will contact you for further disposition.
headerShipViewInTransit: We are expecting to receive your shipment on the estimated arrival date. You can still print and paste labels if you have not sent your shipment. We will receive the inventory once the complete shipment has arrived and update the shipment and inventory status.
headerShipViewReceived: We have received your shipment. You can view the shipment receipt which shows the number of units received against each product in the shipment. If we received any unidentified products in your shipment, our client service will contact you for further disposition.
headerShipCancelled: All cancelled inbound Shipments are listed here for your reference. Cancelled Shipments are shown only for your reference and cannot be restored.
noShipmentsHeaderTextPending: You don't have any Shipment in Pending status.
noShipmentsHeaderSubTextPending: Create a Shipment to send/replenish inventory. Read our Shipment guide on the best practices employed for labelling and packaging.
noShipmentsHeaderTextInTransit: You don't have any Shipment in In transit.
noShipmentsHeaderSubTextInTransit: Send your inventory to the warehouse by creating a Shipment.
noShipmentsHeaderTextReceived: You don't have any Shipment in received status. Send one now!
noShipmentsHeaderTextCancelled: You don't have any Shipment in Cancelled status.
headerOrdersAll: All your orders from different channels and multiple statuses are shown here. Orders can be created one at a time or in bulk by uploading a file using our standard template. If you are connected to a sales channel, your orders will be automatically imported. Click on other views in the left to filter orders by specific statuses.
headerOrdersHasIssue: Has Issues orders have one or more problems that need your attention before they can be approved. All issues pertaining to this order are listed below. This can be missing or invalid inputs, unidentified products or insufficient inventory for products in the order. Inventory will not be reserved for products inside these orders until they are approved.
headerOrdersUnapproved: Unapproved orders are awaiting your approval before they can be processed and fulfilled. Inventory will not be reserved for products inside these orders until they are approved.
headerOrdersInprocess: In Process orders have been approved by you earlier and can no longer be edited. These orders are being processed in our system and waiting for fulfillment.
headerOrdersUnderFull: Fulfillment orders have been sent to the warehouse and are being picked and packed for your customers. A packing list will be enclosed in every order with the date, order id, header and footer message as provided. Refer to the order history at the bottom for detailed tracking milestones.
headerOrdersShipped: Shipped orders have been dispatched from our warehouse using the delivery method selected by you. You can find the tracking number under the Order specification. Refer to the Order History for detailed tracking milestones. Some delivery methods may not provide detailed tracking information.
headerOrdersDelivered: Delivered orders have been successfully received by your customers.
headerOrdersDraft: Draft orders are orders saved by you earlier which are not yet validated. Click the Edit icon to continue to edit, create and approve the order. Inventory will not be reserved for products added inside draft orders.
headerOrdersCancelled: All cancelled orders are listed here for your reference.
headerOrdersUndeliverable: RTS (Returned to Sender) are orders that never reached your customer and have been returned to the warehouse. A physical check for package level damages is done and put away for fulfillment.
headerOrderViewHasIssues: Has Issues orders have one or more problems that need your attention before they can be approved. All issues pertaining to this order are listed below. This can be missing or invalid inputs, unidentified products or insufficient inventory for products in the order. Inventory will not be reserved for products inside these orders until they are approved.
headerOrderViewUnapproved: Unapproved orders are awaiting your approval before they can be processed and fulfilled. Inventory will not be reserved for products inside these orders until they are approved.
headerOrderViewInProcess: In Process orders have been approved by you earlier and can no longer be edited. These orders are being processed in our system and waiting for fulfillment. Refer to the order history at the bottom for detailed tracking milestones.
headerOrderViewUnderFulfilment: Fulfillment orders have been sent to the warehouse and are being picked and packed for your customers. A packing list will be enclosed in every order with the date, order id, header and footer message as provided.
headerOrderViewShipped: Shipped orders have been dispatched from our warehouse using the delivery method selected by you. You can find the tracking number under the Order specification. Refer to the Order History at the bottom for detailed tracking milestones. Some delivery methods may not provide detailed tracking information.
headerOrderViewDelivered: Delivered orders have been successfully received by your customers. Refer to the order history at the bottom for detailed tracking milestones.
noOrdersHeaderSubTextAll: You can create orders manually through the user interface or by uploading a spreadsheet.
noOrdersHeaderTextHasIssues: You don't have any Orders in Has Issues status. All Clear!
noOrdersHeaderTextUnaproved: You don't have any Orders under Unapproved.
noOrdersHeaderSubTextUnapproved: You can create an order and leave it in unapproved to revisit it later.
noOrdersHeaderTextInProcess: You don't have any Orders in In Process.
noOrdersHeaderSubTextInProcess: We are super-fast in approving your orders.
noOrdersHeaderTextUnderFulfillment: You don't have any orders in Fulfillment status.
noOrdersHeaderTextShipped: You don't have any orders in Shipped status.
noOrdersHeaderTextDelivered: You don't have orders in Delivered Status.
noOrdersHeaderTextDrafts: You don't have any orders in Drafts.
noOrdersHeaderSubTextDrafts: Saving a draft allows you to save an order and revisit it later.
noOrdersHeaderTextCancelled: You don't have any Orders in Cancelled status.
noOrdersHeaderTextUndeliverable: You don't have any Orders in Undeliverable status.
